Translations.Text: Nun. By the pen and all they write
you are not, by the grace of your Lord, a madman
And you will have a never ending reward
And you are a man of great moral character
You will see and they will see
which of you is afflicted by madness
Your Lord knows best who has strayed from His path, and He knows best who is guided
Then do not obey the unbelievers
They wish that you compromise, so they too can compromise
And do not obey any worthless contemptible swearer
or any backbiter and slander-monger
preventer of good, aggressor and one who is sinner
cruel, moreover, and furthermore one who is despicable
Just because he has money and children
when Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Myth of former people
We will brand him on the snout
We have tested them, as We tested the owners of a certain garden, when they vowed to harvest it in the morning
and made no allowance [for the Will of God]
But a disaster from your Lord came upon it while they slept
By morning it became barren and bleak
At day break they called to one another
saying, "Go early to your crop if you want to harvest the fruit
So they set out, whispering
Make sure no poor person enters the garden today
And early they went bent on their purpose
But when they saw it, they said, " We are lost
Rather, we have been ruined
The most moderate of them said, "Did I not say to you, that you should praise your Lord's glory
They said, "May our Lord be exalted in His glory, we were unjust
Then they turned to one another, each blaming the other
They said, "How terrible for us; we were aggressors
Perhaps our Lord will give us a better substitute for it. We are turning to our Lord in hope
Such is the punishment. And the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew
There will be Gardens of delight for those who are mindful of God
Would We treat those who submit to us like those who forced others to reject Our messages
What is the matter with you? How do you judge
Or do you have a Book which you study
And in it do you find all that you wish for
Or do you have oaths from Us, that are binding until the Day of Resurrection, allowing you to have whatever you want
Ask them which of them, will be responsible for that claim
Or do they have partners? Then let them bring their partners, if they are telling the truth
On the Day when legs are bared, they will be called to bow down, but will not be able
Their eyes humbled, humiliation will cover them. They were invited to bow down while they were healthy
So leave those who deny this revelation to Me. We will proceed against them gradually, from whence they do not know
And I will give them time. My plan is firm
Or do you ask them for a wage, so they are burdened with debt
Or do they know the future, and they write what is going to happen
So be patient for your Lord's judgment, and do not be like the fellow of the whale who called out in despair
Had a blessing from his Lord not reached him, he would have been abandoned and disgraced on a naked shore
But his Lord chose him and made him among the righteous
Those unbelievers all but kill you with their evil looks when they hear the message, and they say, "He must be mad
But it is only a reminder to all people
